pr_title: Update ascanrulesBeta to take advantage of 2.10 core

timeline.message:
Update to take advantage of 2.10 core

- Update scan rules to leverage new Custom Pages functionality.
- Update build file to target ZAP 2.10 and leverage the core snapshot
library.
- Update CHANGELOG with a change note about the updates.
- Fix naming mistake on RCE and Source Code Disclosure CVE-2012-1823
scan rules (the leading 2 on the year had been dropped).

Signed-off-by: kingthorin <kingthorin@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.bodyText: The 0 check can be removed, the base messages now have a response always.
timeline.author: thc202

timeline.bodyText: Remove? It will be always false. (Same comment for following changes.)
timeline.author: thc202

replies.bodyText: I figured it was good to be consistent with the logging, since the existing message lists the status code?
replies.author: kingthorin

replies.bodyText:
I can revert it, just want to be sure we're on the same page.
Also for "following changes" did you mean just the logging or the other isPage200s as well? (I assume logging, but again want to assure we're aligned.)
replies.author: kingthorin

replies.bodyText:
Right, that might be confusing, drop the status code instead? Just say  "Got a non-200 response when ...."?
Yeah, it was for the logging.
replies.author: thc202
